basic_info.description_header: “Perfection and Innovation is often portrayed in worlds of fiction and the future. Ambition and resilience often translate these values into Reality”
basic_info.description: Hi my name is Zoe Gonzalez, a former ‘IT’, submariner, and proud US Navy veteran. I am an aspiring learner who loves to take on challenges head on. I believe software development is best choice moving forward in my life. Technology runs the world... and I believe becoming a software developer is instrumentally helpful on a professional and personal level.

projects.title: Gallery of Horns
projects.description: The most complex, web application I've work on yet. Favorite and heart your favorite horned beast, and even sort by the number of horns they have!

projects.title: Story Not Story
projects.description: This was group Project that I collaborated with others in, it generates random stories based on a variety of empty inputs. I was responsible for the backbone and structure of the JavaScript factors of this assignment.

projects.title: Sale Data Tracker
projects.description: The first app I worked on that really introduced me coding, my first indepth look at JavaScript prototypes and objects. This solves the purpose of tracking sales day by day. In this instance is was for a cookie business.
